title._content: [Man from: Unidentified soldier in Union uniform and unidentified woman in dress in locket] (LOC)

description._content: [Man from: Unidentified soldier in Union uniform and unidentified woman in dress in locket] [between 1861 and 1865] 2 photographs in 1 case : round tintype, hand-colored ; 4.2 cm diameter (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Metal locket with circular design with braided lanyard and binocular talisman with unidentified insignia. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Subjects: United States.--Army.--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Union--1860-1870. Women--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Union--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Union. Format: Lockets--1860-1870. Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Tintypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.27492 hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.27491 hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.27490 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2612
